LanguageData.Bullet_DMS_LightMachineGun.label: Full-power rifle bullet
LanguageData.DMS_AntiMaterialRifle.label: Mech AMR
LanguageData.DMS_AntiMaterialRifle.description:
High caliber sniper rifle made to be used by MS-4E Jadger automatroids to snipe armored targets at long range.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use, thus a standard baseline human may be unable to use them normally without external assistance from specialiced equipment or being extra strong.
LanguageData.DMS_AntiMaterialRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_AntiMaterialRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_AssaultRifle.label: Mech Assault Rifle
LanguageData.DMS_AssaultRifle.description:
A full metal assault rifle designed for mech soldiers, with an attached picatinny rail as long as the gun itself for all tacticool needs.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use, thus a standard baseline human may be unable to use them normally without external assistance from specialized equipment or being extra strong.
